author: Special Correspondent
text: Development works worth Rs. 66.9 lakh were launched in different villages in Omalur panchayat union limits recently. The work included laying of tar roads in Vellalapatti panchayat (Rs. 10 lakh); Moonkilpadi (Rs. 20 lakh); laying of drinking water pipelines (Rs. 9.20 lakh) and drainage (Rs. 19.70 lakh), tar road (Rs. 5.5 lakh), parapet for the panchayat open well (Rs. 2.5 lakh), all in Thekkampatti panchayat. Palpakki C. Krishnan, MLA, laid the foundation stone for the development works at a function held recently.
title: Development work worth Rs. 66.9 lakh launched
